ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to thank Dr. Dun Deng, Dr. Zhichang Liu, Ms. Zhimei Tian, and Ms. Yiyan Cui for their help in the successful completion of this study.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This study was supported by the Presidential Foundation of the Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences (201802B, 201621) and Guangdong Modern Agro-industry Technology Research System (2016LM1080, 2017LM1080). We also would like to thank EditorBar ( http://online.editorbar.com) for English language editing.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets supporting the conclusions of this article are included within the article.
